title: A Sweet n' Spicy Drizzle of Awwdorable Cat Memes to Sauce-Up the Meownotony of the Hooman World
description: Cats are independent little guys, it's half the allure of cat ownership to many cat lovers. The other half of our love for cats stems from their sweet n' spicy purrsonalities. One minute, they're cuddly and adorable in your arms and the next minute they're attacking your wrists and gnawing on your digits. Odds are, you got a little too close to their primordial pouch when you were petting them, so as the lords of this household, they punished you severely. Cats will be cats. Sweet one minute and then spicy the next, cattos will keep their hoomans on their toes, enjoying the pleasures of being worshipped in a household of cat-fearing servants. So if you have a feline at home who's just as savory as they are audacious, you'll understand that one fallen potted plant is a small price to pay for the unbelievably cozy cuddles of your feline compatriot.Pawsitive Vibes: Subscribe to our weekly newsletter for the purrfect Caturday treat!
author: Jesse Kessenheimer
excerpt: A Sweet n' Spicy Drizzle of Awwdorable Cat Memes to Sauce-Up the Meownotony of the Hooman World - World's largest collection of cat memes and other animals

html:
Cats are independent little guys, it's half the allure of cat ownership to many cat lovers. The other half of our love for cats stems from their sweet n' spicy purrsonalities. One minute, they're cuddly and adorable in your arms and the next minute they're attacking your wrists and gnawing on your digits. Odds are, you got a little too close to their primordial pouch when you were petting them, so as the lords of this household, they punished you severely. 

Cats will be cats. 

Sweet one minute and then spicy the next, cattos will keep their hoomans on their toes, enjoying the pleasures of being worshipped in a household of cat-fearing servants. So if you have a feline at home who's just as savory as they are audacious, you'll understand that one fallen potted plant is a small price to pay for the unbelievably cozy cuddles of your feline compatriot.

Pawsitive Vibes: Subscribe to our weekly newsletter for the purrfect Caturday treat!
